name: CRABBY BEACH give me my castle!
name_original: CRABBY BEACH give me my castle!
description:
It's a hot summer day and the crabs are going wild. The sand is warm and the waves are unforgiving. 

Join Swimsuit Boy in his quest to build the best castle from nothing. Grab the building materials, avoid garbage, escape from crabs and all hail the big wave.

Have fun, don't forget the sunscreen!
